website_summaries.verdict: Considering the New Balance Fresh Foam LinksPro as the go-to footwear is an easy decision. It provides the benefits of comfort and water protection throughout the round. Not to mention, its fresh looks are appreciated on the links. Golfers give their 100% recommendation for this pair.
pros: Many of those who reviewed the New Balance Fresh Foam LinksPro are certain that it is comfortable
A golfer claims that the quality of this New Balance pair lives up to the standards of the brand
This product is incredibly lightweight, according to a tester
An individual was able to test its waterproofing claim and is pleased that it lives up to its promise
A couple of fashion-conscious athletes are fans of how this item is styled
Some users claim that this pair is lightweight
One who's suffering from leg and foot issues feels delighted that this pair does not aggravate them
cons: A golfer feels upset that the eyelets ripped easily

customer_reviews.title: Really nice design
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best. I like the design where there is no tongue. It’s hard for me to find wide. These are nice and wide. I just purchased a second pair to put up for future.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: cHINESE made golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: No tongue, return shoes. Also made in China, I hoping it was a USA MADE SHOE. The description said USA or import made. I do not buy made in china
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable Golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: After 18 years I had to breakdown and buy a new golf shoe that fit my older feet! Played last night and they were extremely comfortable and supported my arch much better. No pain in the feet or legs after the round and I dropped 8 strokes as well. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable and great grip. A little tough to clean but can be done. Love them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and a pleasure to wear. Look great, and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: tongue of the shoe is integrated into the shoe and doesn't allow extra expansion to put on
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to get on initially because the tongue of the shoe is not independent, but a integrated part of the upper shoe. After about 40 rounds, the plastic eyelet for the top lace broke on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit great on my feet and were very comfortable to wear. Played 18 last week in them and my game improved because with my feet planted better I got more distance on each drive and hit on the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eyelet broke within 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: Shoes didn't even hold up for a single month of use, less than 5 rounds of golf. The cheap rubber eyelet broke/ripped after 5th use. Total garbage for a $120 pair of shoes. There are much better options out there that will last longer than 5 uses in this price range. #disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! My feet aren’t tired after walking 18 and the grip is great!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: NB Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best pair of golf shoes I’ve worn.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these spikes for your round of golf!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and extremely comfortable. Can’t wait to get out and play in them this weekend! Extremely fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: When I put these golf shoes on, they fit like a glove. Super comfy and no breaking in necessary. So happy with this shoe that I bought the same shoe in black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Upper feels like it is made of plastic. Hot on summer days
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Shoe quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: After wearing them twice the eyelet broke when tightening them.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon DeVos

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sole coming apart after 7 months. Would not recommend for the price
customer_reviews.author: andrew mcnellen

customer_reviews.title: Leaker
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are suppose to be waterproof but if there is moisture on the grass your feet are wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe, didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe, however it didn’t quite fit my foot. New Balance shoes tend to fit wider feet. My foot is narrow so I couldn’t use these. Otherwise I liked the style and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: New Balance does it again!
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and very durable. Not to mention they look great and have great grip on the course. I’ve worn them for about 20 rounds of golf so far and have had ZERO issues. I’m about to purchase another pair in black. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting golf shoe ever. Bought a 2nd pair. Feet stayed dry the one time it has rained on me. Not having a tongue in the shoe makes it a little harder to get on but nothing too difficult. Its worth it for the fantastic fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid golf shoe for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe that performs well on the course. Ran a half size large compared to my usual NB running and golf shoes. Runs a bit wider than those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Leonard

product_meta.title: New Balance mens Fresh Foam Links Pro
product_meta.description: The New Balance NB Fresh Foam Links Pro Golf Shoes feature the soft, supportive, adaptable Fresh Foam midsole, which provides superior cushioning for a cloud-like feel, while stabilizing the perimeter of your foot to keep you planted throughout the golf swing. The waterproof leather and mesh upper helps keep your feet dry in poor conditions. To improve grip and stability, New Balance designed the exoskeleton TPU outsole to move with the natural motion of your foot, and added FastTwist 3.0 Pulsar cleats. New Balance backs the Fresh Foam Links Pro Golf Shoes with a 2-year waterproof warranty. New Balance NB Fresh Foam Links Pro Golf Shoes - Black Feature: Waterproof microfiber leather/performance mesh upper with TPU eyestay 10mm drop Fresh Foam innovative midsole provides superior cushioning for a cloud-like feel Exoskeleton TPU outsole designed to move with the natural motion of your foot Molded CUSH+ insole for maximum comfort Bootie construction for an enhanced fit FastTwist 3.0 removable Pulsar cleats Weight: 11
feature_bullets: Waterproof microfiber leather/performance mesh upper with TPU eyestay
Exoskeleton TPU outsole designed to move with the natural motion of your foot with FastTwist 3.0 removable Pulsar cleats
10mm drop Fresh Foam innovative midsole provides ultra-cush, cloud-like feel
Molded CUSH+ insole for superior comfort
